text: @MariaBartiromo @SundayFutures @FoxNews @MorningsMaria @FoxBusiness My how covid19 seems to be just the ticket for the democRats. Couldn't of been any better to impede the progress of all their criminality's  ... almost like they were in cahoots with the Chinese Virus !!
